pages.text: $(li)You can access to a Portable Crafting Table pressing the V key on your keyboard.$(br)$(li)In other words, with this function, you will not need to place a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) to use it anymore.$(br)$(li)Sadly, this function only works with the common Oak Crafting Table.
